mapper.sql: f_id, f_academy_id, f_enrollment_id, f_class_id, f_name, f_number, f_is_delete, f_creator_id, f_createtime, f_updater_id, f_updatetime
mapper.select: select st.f_id, st.f_academy_id, st.f_enrollment_id, st.f_class_id, st.f_name, st.f_number,a.f_name as academyName,e.f_name as enrollmentYear,c.f_name as className from t_student st left join t_academy a on st.f_academy_id = a.id left join t_enrollment_year e on st.f_enrollment_id = e.id left join t_class c on st.f_class_id = c.id where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and st.f_is_delete = false;
mapper.insert: insert into t_student (f_id, f_academy_id, f_enrollment_id, f_class_id, f_name, f_number, f_is_delete, f_creator_id, f_createtime, f_updater_id, f_updatetime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{academyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enrollmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update t_student
f_academy_id = #{academyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_enrollment_id = #{enrollmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_updater_id = #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
f_updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_student set f_academy_id = #{academyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_enrollment_id = #{enrollmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_class_id = #{classId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, f_is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, f_creator_id = #{creatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, f_updater_id = #{updaterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, f_updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select st.f_id, st.f_academy_id, st.f_enrollment_id, st.f_class_id, st.f_name, st.f_number,a.f_name as academyName,e.f_name as enrollmentYear,c.f_name as className from t_student st left join t_academy a on st.f_academy_id = a.id left join t_enrollment_year e on st.f_enrollment_id = e.id left join t_class c on st.f_class_id = c.id where st.f_is_delete = false;
